posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.64 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Now when you archive an unread message thread it will stay unread. We drew inspiration from the timeless tradition of putting a book back on the shelf even though you haven’t finished reading it yet.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.63 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.64.0.834-beta

36 new commits since 7.63.0.829-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.64 [1]

  • Move more delegates in AttachmentApprovalViewController [2]

  • Don't mark as read when archiving threads [3]

  • Don’t reconnect if elsewhere’d in the background [4]

  • Allow both fetch mechanisms in a single process [5]

  • Use web sockets in the notification service [6]

  • Fix group size checks when adding/inviting members [7]

  • Adopt libsignal 0.74.0 and opt-out of SPQR for now [8]

  • Rebuild CallUIAdapter after the current call ends [9]

  • titleview sometimes disappears when orientation changes. [10]

  • Dismiss group call UI after the call ends [11]

  • Vary QuickRestore 'old device' messaging based on restore method [12]

  • Add CDN HEAD request [13]

  • Wire up BackupRestoreConfirmation into reg flow [14]

  • Add 'manualRestore' pathway [15]

  • Refactor BackupAttachmentUploadQueue [16]

  • Group link QR code layout stretched in horizontal orientation [17]

  • Add cancel button when creating a call link [18]

  • Improve reliability when joining groups via links [19]

  • Fix conflict resolution for banned group members [20]

  • Adjust profile fetch cache ttl [21]

  • Group adds & invites should be urgent. [22]

  • Clear pendingPreKeyRotation when an error occurs [23]

  • Handle overall send errors [24]

  • Add @objc annotation to support Mantle (de)serialization [25]

  • Add LocalDeviceAuthentication, use in LinkedDevicesView [26]

  • Introduce BackupOnboardingCoordinator [27]

  • Add "Backup Key intro" view to Backups onboarding [28]

  • Add "Record Backup Key" to Backup onboarding [29]

  • Add "Confirm Backup Key" to Backup Onboarding [30]

  • Use doubly-encrypted size for media tier size estimation [31]

  • Explicitly annotate modal methods as @MainActor [32]

  • Asyncify media send checks [33]

  • Do not assume backups are enabled and set backupPlan=free when link'n'syncing [34]

  • Update release notes [35]

  • Update translations [36]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.63.0.829-beta…7.64.0.834-beta

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.65 release.
